mapper.select: SELECT MAX(i.img_seq) as minImgSeq FROM event_image ei, image i WHERE ei.img_seq = i.img_seq AND i.is_thumbnail = 'n' AND ei.event_seq = #{eventSeq}

SELECT T1.*, T2.* FROM ( SELECT B.rnum as num, B.img_seq as imgSeq, B.event_seq as eventSeq, B.origin_name as originName, B.server_name as serverName, B.img_type as imgType, B.img_size as imgSize, B.is_thumbnail as isThumbnail, DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd'),TO_CHAR(B.reg_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd') ,TO_CHAR(B.reg_dt,'hh24:mi') ,TO_CHAR(B.reg_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd')) as regDt, B.reg_id as regId FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT ei.img_seq ,ei.event_seq ,i.origin_name ,i.server_name ,i.img_type ,i.img_size ,i.is_thumbnail ,reg_dt ,i.reg_id FROM event_image ei, image i WHERE ei.img_seq = i.img_seq AND i.is_thumbnail = 'n' AND ei.event_seq = #{searchSeq} AND ei.img_seq <= #{searchSeqSub} ORDER BY ei.img_seq DESC ) A WHERE rownum <= #{pageSize} * #{pageNum} ) B WHERE rnum >= ( #{pageSize} * ( #{pageNum} - 1 ) + 1 ) ) T1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCnt FROM event_image ei, image i WHERE ei.img_seq = i.img_seq AND i.is_thumbnail = 'n' AND ei.img_seq <= #{searchSeqSub} AND ei.event_seq = #{searchSeq} ) T2
SELECT imgSeq, eventSeq FROM( SELECT ei.img_seq as imgSeq, ei.event_seq as eventSeq FROM event_image ei, image i WHERE ei.event_seq = #{eventSeq} ORDER BY ei.img_seq DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT ei.img_seq as imgSeq FROM event_image ei, image i WHERE ei.img_seq = i.img_seq AND ei.event_seq = #{eventSeq} AND i.is_thumbnail = 'y'

SELECT ei.img_seq as imgSeq ,ei.event_seq as eventSeq ,i.origin_name as originName ,i.server_name as serverName ,i.img_type as imgType ,i.img_size as imgSize ,i.is_thumbnail as isThumbnail ,TO_CHAR(i.reg_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as regDt ,i.reg_id as regId FROM event_image ei, image i WHERE ei.img_seq = i.img_seq AND ei.img_seq = #{imgSeq}
